entities.name: Dynamic Web-app Cluster

effectors.name: deploy

parameters.name: targetName
parameters.description: context path where WAR should be deployed (/ for ROOT)

effectors.description: Deploys the given artifact, from a source URL, to a given deployment filename/context

effectors.name: redeployAll
effectors.description: Redeploys all web apps known here across the cluster (e.g. if it gets into an inconsistent state)

effectors.name: replaceMember

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: The entity id of a member to be replaced

effectors.description: Replaces the entity with the given ID, if it is a member; first adds a new member, then removes this one. Returns id of the new entity; or throws exception if couldn't be replaced.

effectors.name: resize

parameters.name: desiredSize
parameters.description: The new size of the cluster

effectors.description: Changes the size of the entity (e.g. the number of nodes in a cluster)

effectors.name: resizeByDelta

parameters.name: delta
parameters.description: The change in number of nodes

effectors.description: Changes the size of the cluster.

effectors.name: restart
effectors.description: Restart the process/service represented by an entity

effectors.name: start

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description: The location or locations to start in, as a string, a location object, a list of strings, or a list of location objects

effectors.description: Start the process/service represented by an entity

effectors.name: stop
effectors.description: Stop the process/service represented by an entity

sensors.name: cluster.entity
sensors.description: The cluster an entity is a member of

sensors.name: cluster.first
sensors.description: Set on an entity if it is the first member of a cluster

sensors.name: cluster.first.entity
sensors.description: The first member of the cluster

sensors.name: cluster.member
sensors.description: Set on an entity if it is a member of a cluster

sensors.name: cluster.one_and_all.members.up
sensors.description: True cluster is running, there is on member, and all members are service.isUp

sensors.name: dynamiccluster.entityQuarantined
sensors.description: Entity failed to start, and has been quarantined

sensors.name: dynamiccluster.failedSubLocations
sensors.description: Sub locations that seem to have failed

sensors.name: dynamiccluster.quarantineGroup
sensors.description: Group of quarantined entities that failed to start

sensors.name: dynamiccluster.subLocations
sensors.description: Locations for each availability zone to use

sensors.name: group.members
sensors.description: Members of the group

sensors.name: group.members.added
sensors.description: Entity added to group members

sensors.name: group.members.count
sensors.description: Number of members

sensors.name: group.members.removed
sensors.description: Entity removed from group members

sensors.name: http.port
sensors.description: HTTP port

sensors.name: https.port
sensors.description: HTTP port (with SSL/TLS)

sensors.name: service.isUp
sensors.description: Whether the service is active and availability (confirmed and monitored)

sensors.name: service.state
sensors.description: Actual lifecycle state of the service

sensors.name: webapp.deployedWars
sensors.description: Names of archives/contexts that are currently deployed

sensors.name: webapp.enabledProtocols
sensors.description: List of enabled protocols (e.g. http, https)

sensors.name: webapp.https.ssl
sensors.description: SSL Configuration for HTTPS

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.bytes.received
sensors.description: Total bytes received by the webserver

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.bytes.sent
sensors.description: Total bytes sent by the webserver

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.errors
sensors.description: Request errors

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.errors.perNode
sensors.description: Cluster entity request error average

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.perSec.last
sensors.description: Reqs/sec (last datapoint)

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.perSec.last.perNode
sensors.description: Reqs/sec (last datapoint) averaged over all nodes

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.perSec.windowed
sensors.description: Reqs/sec (over time window)

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.perSec.windowed.perNode
sensors.description: Reqs/sec (over time window) averaged over all nodes

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.processingTime.fraction.last
sensors.description: Fraction of time spent processing, reported by webserver (percentage, last datapoint)

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.processingTime.fraction.windowed
sensors.description: Fraction of time spent processing, reported by webserver (percentage, over time window)

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.processingTime.fraction.windowed.perNode
sensors.description: Fraction of time spent processing reported by webserver (percentage, over time window) averaged over all nodes

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.processingTime.max
sensors.description: Max processing time for any single request, reported by webserver (millis)

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.processingTime.perNode
sensors.description: Total processing time per node (millis)

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.processingTime.total
sensors.description: Total processing time, reported by webserver (millis)

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.total
sensors.description: Request count

sensors.name: webapp.reqs.total.perNode
sensors.description: Cluster entity request average

sensors.name: webapp.url
sensors.description: URL

config.name: cluster.initial.quorumSize
config.description: Initial cluster quorum size - number of initial nodes that must have been successfully started to report success (if < 0, then use value of INITIAL_SIZE)

config.name: cluster.initial.size
config.description: Initial cluster size

config.name: cluster.member.id
config.description: The unique ID number (sequential) of a member of a cluster

config.name: dynamiccluster.availabilityZones
config.description: availability zones to use (if non-null, overrides other configuration)

config.name: dynamiccluster.customChildFlags
config.description: Additional flags to be passed to children when they are being created

config.name: dynamiccluster.factory
config.description: factory for creating new cluster members

config.name: dynamiccluster.firstmemberspec
config.description: entity spec for creating new cluster members, used for the very first member if different

config.name: dynamiccluster.memberspec
config.description: entity spec for creating new cluster members

config.name: dynamiccluster.numAvailabilityZones
config.description: number of availability zones to use (will attempt to auto-discover this number)

config.name: dynamiccluster.quarantineFailedEntities
config.description: If true, will quarantine entities that fail to start; if false, will get rid of them (i.e. delete them)

config.name: dynamiccluster.quarantineFilter
config.description: Quarantine the failed nodes that pass this filter (given the exception thrown by the node). Default is those that did not fail with NoMachinesAvailableException (Config ignored if quarantineFailedEntities is false)

config.name: dynamiccluster.removalstrategy
config.description: strategy for deciding what to remove when down-sizing

config.name: dynamiccluster.restartMode
config.description: How this cluster should handle restarts; by default it is disallowed, but this key can specify a different mode. Modes supported by dynamic cluster are 'off', 'sequqential', or 'parallel'. However subclasses can define their own modes or may ignore this.

config.name: dynamiccluster.zone.enable
config.description: Whether to use availability zones, or just deploy everything into the generic location

config.name: dynamiccluster.zone.failureDetector
config.description: Zone failure detector

config.name: dynamiccluster.zone.placementStrategy
config.description: Node placement strategy

config.name: enricher.service_state.children_and_members.quorum.running
config.description: Problems check from children actual states (lifecycle), applied by default to members and children, not checking upness, but requiring by default that none are on-fire

config.name: enricher.service_state.children_and_members.quorum.up
config.description: Up check, applied by default to members, requiring at least one present and up

config.name: group.members.delegate
config.description: Deprecated: Add delegate child entities for members of the group

config.name: group.members.delegate.nameFormat
config.description: Delegate members name format string (Use %s for the original entity display name)

config.name: http.port
config.description: HTTP port

config.name: https.port
config.description: HTTP port (with SSL/TLS)

config.name: java.check.hostname.bug
config.description: Check whether hostname is too long and will likely crash Javadue to bug 7089443

config.name: java.opts
config.description: Java command line options

config.name: java.sysprops
config.description: Java command line system properties

config.name: java.version.required
config.description: Java version required

config.name: wars.by.context
config.description: Map of context keys (path in user-facing URL, typically without slashes) to archives (e.g. WARs by URL) to deploy, supporting file: and classpath: prefixes)

config.name: wars.named
config.description: Archive files to deploy, as URL strings (supporting file: and classpath: prefixes); context (path in user-facing URL) will be inferred by name

config.name: wars.root
config.description: WAR file to deploy as the ROOT, as URL (supporting file: and classpath: prefixes)

config.name: webapp.enabledProtocols
config.description: List of enabled protocols (e.g. http, https)

config.name: webapp.https.ssl
config.description: SSL Configuration for HTTPS

entities.description: A cluster of web-apps, which can be dynamically re-sized; this does not include a load-balancer
